/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import { motion, useAnimation } from 'framer-motion'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer'; import './css_files/footer.css'; import pdf from '../whitePaperShibex/up_white_paper.pdf'; const Footer = () => { const { ref, inView } = useInView({ threshold: 0.9, }); const animation = useAnimation(); useEffect(() => { if (inView) { animation.start({ opacity: 1, transition: { delay: 0.1 } }); } if (!inView) { animation.start({ opacity: 0 }); } }, [inView, animation]); const animation2 = useAnimation(); useEffect(() => { if (inView) { animation2.start({ y: '0' }); } if (!inView) { animation2.start({ y: '100vh' }); } }, [inView, animation2]); return (
